definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: in Moab, S. of Arnon (Hr Nu 21:15, elsewhere chiefly Arohr);—´[[ע]] Nu 21:15, De 2:9, De 2:18, De 2:29; [[עָר מוֹאָד]] Nu 21:28, Is 15:1; —usually interpreted as capital city ([[עָר]] = [[עִיר]]) of Moab (DHM:ZMG xxxvii (1883), 398 cp. Sab. [[ער]] fortified height, cf. Mordtm:Him. Inschr. 29 Hal:Ét. Sab. 159 so Ar. 0l9ur=u, dial. of Yemen); Buhl:Geogr.269 f. thinks name of district S. of Arnon.
